EmailTemplate.subject: Impact Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you so much for your interest in Impact School of Leadership. Here is the link to download the 2006/2007 application: http://absoluteontheweb.com/impact/Impact0607.pdf. In the meantime, if you have any questions, please do not hestitate to contact us at impact@absoluteontheweb.com. We are looking forward to the possibly of having you join our Impact class!
Christal Earle, Director of Staff and Leadership Development Absolute Leadership Development Toll-Free: 1-866-432-4464
